Course_description: This course introduces the fundamental concepts and analytical methods for electric circuits.
Course_objectives:
1. Learn basic circuit theorems and analysis methods
2. Understand characteristics of basic electric components
3. Learn first-order and second-order transient analysis of circuits
Course_content:
1. Basic Concepts
2. Basic Laws
3. Methods of Analysis
4. Circuit Theorems
5. Operational Amplifiers
6. Capacitors, Inductors and Mutual Inductors
7. First-order Circuits
8. Second-order Circuits
Evaluation: 作業與出席狀況(10%)、期中考(40%)、期末考(50%)
Textbook:
"Fundamentals of Electric Circuits," McGraw-Hill, 7th Ed., 2021
by C. K. Alexander and M. N. O. Sadiku
